item.description: Authors: Collins, Doug Published: February 2018 URL: https://www.congress.gov/bill/115th-congress/house-bill/4943

item.title: Promoting Public Saftey, Privacy, and the Rule of Law Around the World: The Purpose and Impact of the CLOUD Act
S. 2889 - National Security and Personal Data Protection Act of 2019
item.description: Authors: Hawley, Josh and Cotton, Tom and Rubio, Marco Published: November 2019 Abstract: To safeguard data of Americans from foreign governments that pose risks to national security by imposing data security requirements and strengthening review of foreign investments, and for other purposes.
